net.sf.tweety.logics.ml.analysis

Class ProbabilisticAggregatingDistanceFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.tweety.logics.ml.analysis.ProbabilisticAggregatingDistanceFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DistanceFunction

    public class ProbabilisticAggregatingDistanceFunction
extends Object
implements DistanceFunction
    This distance function uses an aggregator on a probabilistically normalized distance for probabilities of each value.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm
    See Also:
